Title: Prohibits the employment of sex offenders in any position having substantial contact with children
Summary: Prohibits the employment of a sex offender in any position having substantial contact with children; defines "substantial contact" as any activity involving children; establishes criminal penalties for violation of statutory provisions.
LawCode: Rel ยง168-w to be ยง168-x, add ยง168-w, Cor L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to prohibiting sex offenders from any position involving substantial contact with children
